p: Except for the murine NoV [ 57], a reproducible system culture allowing the routine replication of in vitro NoVs is still not available. To date, there are two published systems (B cell line and stem cell-derived enteroids) [ 58, 59] supporting replication of human NoVs, but the levels of replication are not sufficient for the generation of highly purified virus stocks or the development of culture-based quantification assays [ 60].
